main event: Multiple witnesses in Coursegold, California reported seeing several unidentified flying objects (UFOs) with pulsating and glowing lights in various colors since October 9, 1962.
interesting points: The UFOs were described as being capable of rapid movements, making sudden stops, and changing directions at high speeds.
One witness reported seeing a rectangular-shaped object with very bright lights at the corners.
The witnesses reported seeing the UFOs as close as half a mile away, but never heard any sounds as the objects moved away at fast speeds.
On October 23, 1966, the witness reported seeing three UFOs at the same time, one to the west, another to the north, and a third to the east of her home.
Other witnesses included neighbors, citizens of nearby communities, and a school teacher in Oakhurst, California.
sighted object: Several unidentified flying objects with pulsating and glowing lights in various colors
witnesses: Civilian witnesses, including a resident, her husband, neighbors, and a school teacher
